text: William Paul Constantino Jr. is an American lawyer and politician who represented the 12th Worcester District in the Massachusetts House of Representatives from 1983 to 1995. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:20th-century American politicians Category:College of the Holy Cross alumni Category:Fitchburg State University alumni Category:Suffolk University Law School alumni Category:Massachusetts lawyers Category:Massachusetts Republicans Category:Members of the Massachusetts House of Representatives Category:People from Clinton, Massachusetts Category:Living people
title: William Constantino Jr.
